```{r}
library(foreign)
library(regsim)

world_data <- read.dta("http://uclspp.github.io/PUBLG100/data/QoG2012.dta")
```

```{r}
model <- lm(undp_hdi ~ wbgi_cce + former_col + wbgi_cce:former_col, data = world_data)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
x <- list(
  former_col = 0:1,
  wbgi_cce = -2:3
)

sim <- regsim(model, x)
summary(sim)
```

```{r}
plot(sim, ~wbgi_cce + former_col, xlab = "Corruption Control")
```
